review: Started as a naked person in a zombie apocalypse. Gets clothes from laundry shops that fits exactly your size.Kill other people to get them naked.'Suicide' to be naked and drop your items on the floor.Everything is naked.Players are naked.I am naked.Nelson is naked.12/10 wud naked again.

review: It's a good visual novel. Even though it's short and had bad endings which made you re-start the whole game unless you saved, I could feel the creators have poured their heart on the visual novel. Small things like these are good based on what effort the creators made. 10/10 for this visual novel. Short but had a good story. Keep going Miss Vinty!
